content:
districts are going to change since the number of representatives changes

state legislatures redraw congressional districts based on the number of representatives allocated every ten years by US congress
	congress allocates the number to each state and the states legislatures redraw their own political boundaries
	each congress dude represents one district and if you drop in congress people due to proportional representation then you need to redraw districts
	note: these districts are not geographically the same size
